DOC.brief_summary: The Zenith® TX2® Low Profile TAA Endovascular Graft study clinical trial approve US FDA evaluate safety effectiveness Zenith® TX2® Low Profile TAA Endovascular Graft indicate treatment patient aneurysms/ulcers descend thoracic aorta vessel structure suitable repair .
DOC.brief_title: TX2® Low Profile TAA Endovascular Graft
DOC.criteria: Descending thoracic aneurysm diameter ≥ 5.0 cm Descending thoracic aneurysm history growth ≥ 0.5 cm per year Descending thoracic degenerative atherosclerotic ulcer ≥ 10 mm depth 20 mm diameter Less 18 year age Life expectancy le 2 year Pregnant breastfeeding plan become pregnant within 60 month Unwilling comply followup schedule Inability refusal give inform consent Less 30 day beyond primary endpoint investigative drug device study
